long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Checkget is an intelligent browser assistant that utilizes the power of ChatGPT to help you accomplish daily tasks efficiently. With Checkget, you can compose emails, find answers, create documents, chat, and write code quickly.

ğŸŒAnytime, Anywhere
You don't need to copy and paste; you can open Checkget from any website by pressing âŒ˜+K (Mac)/Alt+K (Windows) or by clicking on the extension icon, saving you a lot of valuable time.

ğŸ’ªPowerful, or More Powerful
âœ”ï¸ Write emails.
âœ”ï¸ Improve writing.
âœ”ï¸ Fix spelling & grammar.
âœ”ï¸ Make shorter or longer.
âœ”ï¸ Change tone.
âœ”ï¸ Similar pages.
âœ”ï¸ Code optimize.
âœ”ï¸ Code explain.

ğŸ§ Smart, or Smarter
Thanks to the AI boost, it can automatically recognize different scenarios, whether you're replying to an email or explaining code. Just select the text and press âŒ˜/Alt+K, and it will do the rest.

ğŸ”’Privacy and Security, Local Mode
Everything you send is encrypted, and only you and ChatGPT know its contents. If you're still worried, you can choose the local mode, which communicates directly with ChatGPT after setting ApiKey.

Finally, if you have any ideas or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at admin@checkget.com.

long.es:
Checkget AI es un asistente inteligente del navegador que utiliza la potencia de ChatGPT para ayudarte a realizar las tareas diarias de forma eficiente. Con Checkget AI, puedes redactar correos electrÃ³nicos, encontrar respuestas, crear documentos, chatear y escribir cÃ³digo rÃ¡pidamente.

ğŸ§ Smart, o mÃ¡s inteligente

Todo lo que envÃ­as estÃ¡ encriptado, y sÃ³lo tÃº y ChatGPT conocÃ©is su contenido. Si todavÃ­a estÃ¡s preocupado, puedes elegir el modo local, que se comunica directamente con ChatGPT despuÃ©s de configurar ApiKey.

Por Ãºltimo, si tienes alguna idea o sugerencia, no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros en admin@checkget.com.
